metadata.title: CVE-2022-0909 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
Divide By Zero error in tiffcrop in libtiff 4.3.0 allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit f8d0f9aa.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-0909` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.4.0~rc1-1
libtiff-tools - 4.4.0~rc1-1
libtiff5 - 4.4.0~rc1-1
libtiffxx5 - 4.4.0~rc1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0~rc1-1').
